products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The bella blackout graphite roller blind gives you the best of two worlds a bright and open window space in the daytime, then total peace and privacy whenever you require it. Thanks to the blackout backed fabric this modern grey roller blind is highly efficient at blocking light and retaining a cosy and calming atmosphere indoors. products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades. This trendy grey roller blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom or kitchen as it is moisture resistant. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for difficult to reach windows.
